title: Savage Chains: Captured (#1)
description: After spending centuries as a vampire sex slave, Reyes has one to bring down the organization that nearly destroyed him.To do that, he must pose as a sadistic buyer in this dark world of owners and masters. It's the only way to infiltrate the inner circle and destroy them from the inside out. But it means becoming what he hates most.His mission becomes infinitely harder when he sees the prize attraction at a slave Angelica, the woman who stole his heart before he left her behind.Against his better judgment, he buys her in order to save her. But now the woman who holds his heart despises him, believing he's one of the slavers he's out to destroy. Can he tell his beautiful captive the truth and risk everything?Savage Captured is the first intoxicating installment in the Savage Chains novella trilogy from New York Times bestselling author Caris Roane.
author: Caris Roane
